azurerm_api_management_named_value.description: Manages an API Management Named Value.

name.description: The name of the API Management Named Value. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

resource_group_name.description: The name of the Resource Group in which the API Management Named Value should exist. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

api_management_name.description: The name of the [API Management Service](api_management.html

display_name.description: The display name of this API Management Named Value.

value.description: The value of this API Management Named Value.

secret.description: Specifies whether the API Management Named Value is secret. Valid values are `true` or `false`. The default value is `false`.

tags.description: A list of tags to be applied to the API Management Named Value.

id.description: The ID of the API Management Named Value.

create.description: Used when creating the API Management Named Value.

update.description: Used when updating the API Management Named Value.

read.description: Used when retrieving the API Management Named Value.

delete.description: Used when deleting the API Management Named Value.
